com.konakart.app

Class Subscription

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.konakart.app.Subscription
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubscriptionIf

    public class Subscription
extends java.lang.Object
implements SubscriptionIf
    Defines a recurring billing subscription.
